text: Matthew 'Mat' Ryan (1913-1994) was an Australian rugby league player who played in the 1930s. Alan Whiticker/Glen Hudson: Encyclopedia of Rugby League Players, 1995. Ryan followed his brother Bill Ryan to St. George from the local Leeton rugby league club. Both brothers hailed from Junee, New South Wales. Ryan played one season for the Saints before leaving Sydney.Daily Advertiser (Wagga Wagga) "Junee boys made good" 26-6-1936 https://trove.nla.gov.au/newspaper/article/144670473?searchTerm=%22mat%20ryan%22&searchLimits;=l-decade=193|||l-year=1936 Ryan died on 29 October 1994 at Toormina, New South Wales.Sydney Morning Herald - Death Notice 1/11/1994 ==References== Category:1913 births Category:1994 deaths Category:St. George Dragons players Category:Australian rugby league players Category:Rugby league centres
title: Mat Ryan (rugby league)
